mapper.select: SELECT b.`cy_id`,`p_image`,`tc_id` ,MAX(`cy_sales`) FROM `product` a,`commodity` b,`cdetails` c WHERE a.`cs_id`=c.`cs_id` AND b.`cy_id`=c.`cy_id` GROUP BY `tc_id`

SELECT `p_image`,b.`cy_id` ,cy_name ,cy_price FROM `product` a,`commodity` b,`cdetails` c WHERE a.`cs_id`=c.`cs_id` AND b.`cy_id`=c.`cy_id` AND b.`tc_id` IN ( SELECT tc_id FROM tow_class WHERE oc_id=#{oc_id}) LIMIT 6
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMODITY SET CY_INVENTORY=CY_INVENTORY+#{CY_INVENTORY} WHERE CY_ID=#{cy_id}
